headline: Is Dollar Tree Still A Bargain After Its 56% Surge And Recent Pullback?
summary: Wondering if Dollar Tree is still a bargain after its run up, or if the easy money has already been made? This breakdown will walk through what the current price is really telling us about future value. The stock has been on a tear this year, up 56.3% year to date and 62.9% over the last 12 months, even after a sharp 8.9% pullback in the last week that followed a strong 17.4% climb over the past month. That kind of swing has been driven by a mix of strategic updates and broader retail...
